articles.title: 38 Seats In Manipur Go To Polls in First Phase Today: 10 Facts
articles.description: Polling begins today in the troubled northeastern state of Manipur, where the BJP-led alliance is hoping for a second term in power in a multi-cornered contest. Thirty-eight of the states 60 seats vote amid tight security from 7 am.
articles.content:
<li>The first phase of polls covers 29 seats in Manipur's valley districts -- Imphal West, Imphal East, and Bishnupur. The rest are in the hill districts of Kangpokpi, Churachandpur, and Pherzawl.
